title: Nursing Superindent
experience: Minimum 5 years of experience as a staff nurse.
Minimum 1 year of experience as a nursing supervisor.
skills: Strong leadership and team management skills.
Ability to monitor and improve nursing quality.
Proficient in creating and maintaining duty schedules.
responsibilites: Lead and manage the nursing team.
Monitor and ensure the quality of nursing care.
Provide continuous training and development for nursing staff.
Maintain duty schedules for various nursing positions.
Ensure compliance with healthcare regulations and standards.
